channel.title: CNCF on Stefan Gloutnikov
channel.description: Recent content in CNCF on Stefan Gloutnikov

item.title: CNCF Projects Programming Language Statistics
item.description: I had heard before that Go dominates as the programming language of the cloud and wanted to investigate that claim. In this post I looked at the repositories of all Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) projects and assembled statistics on the programming languages used.
